mil6.2.8:1.1_0: “Bhante nāgasena, ye te ahesuṁ tikicchakānaṁ pubbakā ācariyā seyyathidaṁ—
mil6.2.8:1.2_0: nārado dhammantarī aṅgiraso kapilo kaṇḍaraggi sāmo atulo pubbakaccāyano,
mil6.2.8:1.2_1: sabbepete ācariyā sakiṁyeva roguppattiñca nidānañca sabhāvañca samuṭṭhānañca tikicchañca kiriyañca siddhāsiddhañca
mil6.2.8:1.2_2: sabbaṁ taṁ niravasesaṁ jānitvā ‘imasmiṁ kāye ettakā rogā uppajjissantī’ti ekappahārena kalāpaggāhaṁ karitvā
mil6.2.8:1.2_5: kissa pana tathāgato sabbaññū samāno anāgataṁ kiriyaṁ buddhañāṇena jānitvā ‘ettake nāma vatthusmiṁ ettakaṁ
mil6.2.8:1.2_6: nāma sikkhāpadaṁ paññapetabbaṁ bhavissatī’ti paricchinditvā anavasesato sikkhāpadaṁ na paññapesi,
mil6.2.8:1.2_7: uppannuppanne vatthusmiṁ ayase pākaṭe dose vitthārike puthugate ujjhāyantesu manussesu tasmiṁ tasmiṁ kāle sāvakānaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ paññapesī”ti?
mil6.2.8:2.1_1: tathāgatassa ‘imasmiṁ samaye imesu manussesu sādhikaṁ diyaḍḍhasikkhāpadasataṁ paññapetabbaṁ bhavissatī’ti,
mil6.2.8:2.1_2: api ca tathāgatassa evaṁ ahosi ‘sace kho ahaṁ sādhikaṁ diyaḍḍhasikkhāpadasataṁ ekappahāraṁ paññapessāmi,
mil6.2.8:2.1_4: dukkaraṁ vata bho samaṇassa gotamassa sāsane pabbajitun”ti,
mil6.2.8:2.1_7: asaddahantā te manussā apāyagāmino bhavissanti uppannuppanne vatthusmiṁ dhammadesanāya viññāpetvā pākaṭe dose sikkhāpadaṁ paññapessāmī’”ti.
mil6.2.8:3.1_8: ‘bahukaṁ idha sikkhitabban’ti sutvā sattānaṁ santāso uppajjeyya,
